org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.receiver

Interface Receiver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePKReceiver, CertificateReciever, PreSharedKeyReceiver, RekReciever, SignedDataReciever, SymmetricKeyReceiver

    public interface Receiver
    Generic interface for a receiver used during decryption.

    A Recipient interface is used when sending data to others, Receiver is used when receiving data from others.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.crypto.SecretKey extractDecryptionKey(Ieee1609Dot2CryptoManager cryptoManager, RecipientInfo recipientInfo)
      Method to extract decryption key from a RecipientInfo using the reciever data.
      AlgorithmIndicator getHashAlgorithm() 
      HashedId8 getReference(AlgorithmIndicator alg, Ieee1609Dot2CryptoManager cryptoManager) 

    • Method Detail

      • getReference

        HashedId8 getReference(AlgorithmIndicator alg,
                       Ieee1609Dot2CryptoManager cryptoManager)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        alg - algorithm scheme used.
        cryptoManager - the used cryptomanager
        Returns:
        a hashedId8 reference to the reciever, calculated according to the type of related data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fault was discovered in supplied parameters.
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if internal problems occurred generating the reference id.
        java.io.IOException

      • extractDecryptionKey

        javax.crypto.SecretKey extractDecryptionKey(Ieee1609Dot2CryptoManager cryptoManager,
                                            RecipientInfo recipientInfo)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                            java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        Method to extract decryption key from a RecipientInfo using the reciever data.
        Parameters:
        cryptoManager - the used cryptomanager
        Returns:
        the decryption key inside the receiver info envelope.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fault was discovered in supplied parameters.
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if internal problems occurred decrypting the decryption key.
        java.io.IOException - if IO exception occurred communicating with underlying systems

      • getHashAlgorithm

        AlgorithmIndicator getHashAlgorithm()
        Returns:
        the hash algorithm used to calculate the related HashedId8 reference.
